description:
There is a holy island in a lake surrounded by mist. Saint Hakushin, who become a living Buddha a hundred years ago, is venerated there. But something strange happens. The father of a boy named Shintaro goes to investigate, but he doesn`t come back.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Afloat on the Lake Surface: The Barrier of Hijiri Island
Auf See! Die Barriere um die Insel Hijiri
El campo de energía de la isla Hijiri
Komen ni Ukabu Hijirijima no Kekkai
湖面に浮かぶ聖島の結界
